content.raw:
I am detecting the led fine and am using the center of the outward facing led surface as the position we are reporting/publishing to the simulator.

Is this a correct assumption or does NASA want some corner of the leds. NOt sure what the qual1.world console lights pose position coorresponses to so I thought that may be the data that is used for scoring.

Can you guys be specific about exactly what the x,y,z should report.

Thanks
content.html:
I am detecting the led fine and am using the center of the outward facing led surface as the position we are reporting/publishing to the simulator.

Is this a correct assumption or does NASA want some corner of the leds. NOt sure what the qual1.world console lights pose position coorresponses to so I thought that may be the data that is used for scoring.

Can you guys be specific about exactly what the x,y,z should report.

Thanks
